name: White Maw
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, prone

trait.name: Amorphous Form
text: White Maw can occupy another creature's space and vice versa.

trait.name: Corrode Metal
text: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits White Maw corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. if its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits White Maw is destroyed after dealing damage.
White Maw can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

trait.name: False Appearance
text: While White Maw remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from white stone.

trait.name: Killer Response
text: Any creature that starts its turn in White Maw's space is targeted by a pseudopod attack if White Maw isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Pseudopod
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (4d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage. If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

description: Source: Tales from the Yawning Portal p. 248
